attributes.title: Ummmm
attributes.review: So I have no idea what everyone else is talking about with this thing being downloaded in like 300 days. Mine downloaded WAAYY to fast almost like someone WANTED me to download it so they could spy on me. I started the download and only 13 hours later I got it up and running, like that is wayyy to fast, and I knew something suspicious was going on, not to mention after it downloaded I got a message from an unknown number asking for my social security number. I gave it to them because They offered me 3$ and a chance to meet my childhood hero Paul Rudd, and I only ended up getting 25 cents and a promo code for 10% off a little ceasers pizza. My bank account has been emptied and my  dog has been eaten by tiny aphids posing as my friends (I shouldâ€™ve been more suspicious because I have no friends, but . . . what can you do?) and all of this started when I downloaded this app, do NOT recommend.
